org.apache.spark.partial

Class SumEvaluator

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.partial.SumEvaluator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApproximateEvaluator<StatCounter,BoundedDouble>

    public class SumEvaluator
extends Object
implements ApproximateEvaluator<StatCounter,BoundedDouble>
    An ApproximateEvaluator for sums. It estimates the mean and the count and multiplies them together, then uses the formula for the variance of two independent random variables to get a variance for the result and compute a confidence interval.
